snippet: Running back Jamaal Charles, who hurt his quadriceps in a win at Jacksonville over the weekend, is expected to be available for the Chiefs’ game Sunday against the Cowboys.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Kansas City Chiefs running back Jamaal Charles, who bruised his quadriceps in win over Jacksonville Jaguars, is expected to be available for upcoming game against Dallas Cowboys; other football developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Running back Jamaal Charles, who hurt his quadriceps in a win at Jacksonville over the weekend, is expected to be available for the Chiefs’ game Sunday against the Cowboys.

headline.main: Despite Bruised Muscle, Charles Is Expected to Be on Field for the Chiefs
headline.print_headline: Despite Bruised Muscle, Charles Is Expected to Be on Field for the Chiefs
